action--1c250528-ef56-4cf4-a738-f4f29219.description: Terminate any potentially malicious PowerShell processes.

action--e8971ff2-3ae8-4ea6-9fc4-f5e3ced1.description: Check the system logs for any previous suspicious behavior associated with PowerShell.

action--cc9981c7-fd9c-441b-9198-f75f4f0c.description: Ensure the compromised host is isolated from the network to prevent data loss.
